00001 from molDynamics.gulp.potentials.TwoAtomPotential import TwoAtomPotential
00002 from pyre.components.Component import Component
00003 from os import linesep
00004 
00005 class LennardJonesABGulp(TwoAtomPotential):
00006     '''representation of the lennard-jones potential for gulp'''
00007     
00008     class Inventory(TwoAtomPotential.Inventory):
00009         import pyre.inventory as inv
00010         AFit = inv.str("Fit A", default = None)
00011         AFit.meta['tip'] = "whether to change this parameter during a fitting run"
00012         AFit.validator = inv.choice([None,'True','False'])
00013         BFit = inv.bool("Fit B", default = None)
00014         BFit.meta['tip'] = "whether to change this parameter during a fitting run"
00015         BFit.validator = inv.choice([None,'True','False'])
00016                 
00017     def __init__(self, atom1, atom2):
00018         TwoAtomPotential.__init__(self, atom1, atom2)
00019         self.ii=self.inventory
00020         self.ii.atom1 = atom1
00021         self.ii.atom2 = atom2
00022         # add things to the repository
00023         
00024     def write(self):
00025         return "lennard epsilon "\
00026             + self.writeInterIntra()\
00027             + self.writeBonding()\
00028             + self.writeScaling()\
00029             + linesep\
00030             + self.ii.atom1+' '\
00031             + self.ii.atom1Type+' '\
00032             + self.ii.atom2+' '\
00033             + self.ii.atom2Type+' '\
00034             + str(self.potential["A"])+' '\
00035             + str(self.potential["B"])+' '\
00036             + '0.0 ' + str(self.potential["cutoff"])+' '\
00037             + self.getFlag(self.ii.AFit)\
00038             + self.getFlag(self.ii.BFit) + linesep
